mapper.insert: INSERT INTO org_info ( ID, ORG_CODE, ORG_NAME, PARENT_ID, REMARK, STATUS, CREATED_BY, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} );
mapper.update:
UPDATE org_info
ORG_CODE = #{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_NAME = #{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARENT_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_TIME = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATED_TIME = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT ID, ORG_CODE, ORG_NAME, PARENT_ID, REMARK, `STATUS`, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIME, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME FROM org_info WHERE ID LIKE CONCAT( #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM org_info WHERE ID IN
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT ID, ORG_CODE, ORG_NAME, PARENT_ID, REMARK, `STATUS`, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIME, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME FROM org_info WHERE ID = #{id2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT ID, ORG_CODE, ORG_NAME, PARENT_ID, REMARK, `STATUS`, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIME, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME FROM org_info WHERE ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT ID, ORG_CODE, ORG_NAME, PARENT_ID, REMARK, `STATUS`, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIME, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME FROM org_info WHERE ORG_CODE = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT ID, ORG_CODE, ORG_NAME, PARENT_ID, REMARK, `STATUS`, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIME, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME FROM org_info WHERE ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT ID, ORG_CODE, ORG_NAME, PARENT_ID, REMARK, `STATUS`, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIME, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME FROM org_info WHERE ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT ID, ORG_CODE, ORG_NAME, PARENT_ID, REMARK, `STATUS`, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIME, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME FROM org_info
SELECT ID, ORG_CODE, ORG_NAME, PARENT_ID, REMARK, `STATUS`, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIME, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME FROM org_info WHERE ID =#{id}
SELECT ID, ORG_CODE, ORG_NAME, PARENT_ID, REMARK, `STATUS`, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIME, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME FROM org_info WHERE PARENT_ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT MAX(ID) ID FROM org_info WHERE PARENT_ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT ID FROM org_info WHERE ID LIKE CONCAT( #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
SELECT ID, ORG_CODE, ORG_NAME, PARENT_ID, REMARK, `STATUS`, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIME, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME FROM org_info WHERE ID = #{acctInfoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT ID, ORG_CODE, ORG_NAME, PARENT_ID, REMARK, `STATUS`, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIME, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME FROM org_info WHERE ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
